Our Story | Global Ambassadors | Friends of Thriive

About Us

Thriive is a theory. A simple one – a belief that all it takes to transform the ordinary to extraordinary is a pulse of energy that propels a soul stifled “inside the box” to leap “outside the box” with just a single vibrating thought -- an instant, a moment of light, a revelation, that breaks through past shackles and ignites it to Thriive.

What is Thriive?

Thriive Art & Soul, India’s only state-of-the-art digital wellness portal, showcases and registers a verified network of Alternative Healers and Therapists from across 150+ alternative health modalities.

Thriive believes that wellness is our natural state, and each individual can find their way back to source. Thriive’s only a guide that connects a vibrant eco-system of seekers, healers, therapists and experts to share their paths with each other.

It’s a space that’s unique, trustworthy, open-minded, and creates an experience in an individual's life through its curated content, holistic community and fantastic global, life-transforming events and workshops.

How?

Bridging the gap between traditional allopathy and alternative medicine.

Each healer & therapist is personally verified and vetted.

We match every issue — emotional, mental, or physical — with the right solution, and therapy/therapist.

Helping Thriive-verified Alternative healers & therapists expand their healing presence in unexplored territories.

Celebrating the soul through all forms of art, dance, music, and meditation.

Content that sparks curiosity and inspires.

Empowering people to create their own reality.

Forging connections and creating a community of like-minded people through its Moon Magic Meditations and flagship events like the GFSS (Global Festival of Spiritual Sciences) and QEC (Quantum Energy Conclave).

Thriive Headquarters Pyramid Valley International

Pyramid Valley International is home to one of Asia’s largest and most powerful meditation pyramids. This 28 acre valley, where lush coconut groves sway along waterways bordered with Zen gardens and waterfalls, has become a true powerspot in India
Thriive Art and Soul creates and curates international spiritual events at PVI - Pyramid Valley International.

Our Story

Fifteen years ago unbelievable coincidences in the founders’ lives lead them to masters, gurus, speakers, teachers and meditators from all over the world.
Being witness to spontaneous healings, rejuvenated lives, renewed relationships made them realize this: anything is possible! That Heaven is a place on Earth.
There are myriad paths to bliss, to knowing YOU! Pick your path and begin your quest back to yourself.

Discover. Empower. THRIIVE.

Our Pillars

Our pillars are the foundation that Thriive is built on. We take root in their power.

Brahmarshi Patriji

Brahmarshi Subash Patri founded the Pyramid Spiritual Societies movement in 1980, spreading the science of meditation to thousands of villages in South India. Drawing strength from the great masters that came before him he bestows knowledge and wisdom of Anapanasati Meditation and other paths one can take on this journey of enlightenment. But rather than being hailed as a Guru, his mission is to awaken the Inner Guru within all. He was recently awarded the Life Positive Good Karma Award by Speaking Tree.

www.pssmovement.org

Dr. Newton Kondaveti, MD & Dr. Lakshmi Newton, MBBS

Dr. Newton and Dr. Lakshmi – both medical doctors – met, married, and went on to change the landscape of Past Life Regression Therapy in India. Together they’ve travelled the world with their workshops and seminars on PLR, Rebirthing, Life After Death, etc. and are regarded as global experts on Past Life Regression Therapy.

www.luglobal.org

Shreans Daga

Shreans Daga is the Vice-chairman of Pyramid Valley International. He has aided hundreds of masters in spreading their message of light throughout the world. Shreans’ main focus and research has led him to discover the world of quantum energy medicine and the Science of Spirituality. Through Thriive, he dreams of making this world accessible to all souls.

The Founders

Pinky Daga

Pinky Daga is the voice of Thriive. A Ph.D. in Literature & Theatre Arts from Boston University, Pinky was the former owner, playwright, and director of a children’s theatre production house in Mumbai, but her spiritual journey began decades ago. Seeing how simple tools of wisdom could transform lives she passionately conceptualized Thriive Art & Soul to ensure that these tools would be accessible to each soul, no matter what their journey.

Kaushik Daga

Kaushik Daga, Executive Director, Thriive Art & Soul, has always been drawn to his roots at Betul, Madhya Pradesh, where he set up the Pyramid Wellness Centre and the state-of-the-art Satpuda Valley High School. He is also one of main forces behind Thriive headquarters — Pyramid Valley International — transforming the space from a farmland to one of India’s most thriiving power spots. His background in agriculture has empowered him to develop organic soyabean seeds, benefitting a 2000+ farmer network. He finds his calling in the community development work he has undertaken at Betul, and believes that Higher Powers have propelled him to walk down the spiritual path, which is now an organized effort in the form of Thriive Art & Soul.
